description: Information Management Services in support of the Canadian Forces Health Services. The procurement process is based on a Competitive - Open bidding method. The expected contract duration is from 28 February 2023 to 27 February 2027, including three options of one year extension. The Contractor will provide trained personnel to support the Department of National Defence.  The programme will run for 4 years starting April 2023 with a further 3 one year extension options from April 2024 to April 2027.  The expected annual volume requires the Contractor start work within 30 days of request from Tender Award to 1st April  2024 + 3, one year option periods from 1 April .  The contract value is proposed under $20,000,000
